definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: I think you are full of crap, but we do not have tme to debate this.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得你在亂講，開是我們沒有時間去爭論。

sentences.english: Some one may babble a lot willingly to kill time.
sentences.chinese: 有些人是爲了打發時間，也許會口不擇言地亂講一通。

sentences.english: Randomly says, all not in this world, but also how loves me?
sentences.chinese: 亂講，都不在這個世界了，還怎樣愛我啊？

sentences.english: Nonsense. How could you love me while you were not on the earth?
sentences.chinese: 亂講，都不在這個世界上了，還怎麼愛我？

definition: to make a fuss about nothing (idiom)
When you enter a village, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to keep on saying (idiom); to repeat over and over again
to take one's seat according to the ticket number/(fig.) to put (things or people) in their right place/to take a general comment as a personal attack
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
to become visible/to appear/to manifest one's true nature
to work as a good-time girl/to prostitute oneself
lit. a deluge of heavenly flowers (idiom)/fig. extravagant embellishments/hype
to digress/to stray from the subject
to run around all over the place
